section_2.text_1__section_2: My sister is a teacher. She one day came to me complaining there is no good website where you can learn and test your knowledge about the world's countries ğŸ˜±
section_2.text_2__section_2: So guess what I did? I asked her exact needs and created it! ğŸ˜
section_2.text_3__section_2: Today, the 12 classes at her school are using CountryPedia and I am very proud of that. I keep updating the app to introduce features requested by other teachers.
